an3.39:1.3: bhikkhave, uppalaṁ → sudaṁ uppalaṁ (bj, pts1ed) | vappati → pupphati (bj, pts1ed)
an3.39:1.4: akāsikaṁ candanaṁ dhāremi → kāsikaṁ candanaṁ dhāremi (sya-all, km, mr); akāsikaṁ dhāremi (?)
an3.39:1.5: Rattindivaṁ → rattidivaṁ (mr) | pana me su taṁ → panassu me taṁ (bj); pana su me taṁ (sya-all, pts1ed)
an3.39:2.2: paricārayamāno → paricāriyamāno (bj, sya-all, km, mr); parivāriyamāno (pts1ed)
an3.39:11.2: Nekkhamme daṭṭhu khemataṁ → nekkhammaṁ daṭṭhu khemato (si, sya-all, pts1ed)
